title: Financial Engineering
text: Financial Engineering, is an unique inter-disciplinary Dual Degree program offering a B.Tech (Hons.) in any core engineering stream followed by M.Tech in Financial Engineering. The course was introduced in 2010 to meet the demands of engineers equipped with advanced mathematical and computational skills and knowledge in different fields of financial products and markets. [ 1 ] The course is jointly coordinated by Vinod Gupta School of Management .

title: Reviews
text: The information given below expresses personal opinion and views of respective editors and may not necessarily reflect genuine information. Please entertain this subjective content with caution. NOTE: All reviewers must sign their comments with their true identity. Unsigned reviews or reviews that do no conform to editing guidelines will be removed.
